response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting a cost of $10,000 from my perspective. However, considering your appreciation for the product, I am willing to extend an offer at a price that reflects its true worth to you. Therefore, I propose to sell the product to you for $9,500. This price allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your requirements. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
